message:
This past week we were honored to present our law enforcement training in Miami, Fl. We had amazing guest speakers and 2 awesome host police departments. 
Thank you North Miami Police and Hialeah Gardens Police Department for raising awareness about human trafficking. 
Read more about the class here.
https://www.erasechildtrafficking.org/human-trafficking-training

data.description: This law enforcement course provides a Trauma-Informed Approach to investigating human trafficking and other related crimes.
data.title: Human Trafficking Training for Law Enforcement | ERASE Child Trafficking
